alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:14PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Avoyelles Parish through 445 PM CDT... At 414 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Ophelia National Wildlife Refuge, or near Bordelonville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moreauville, Bordelonville, Big Bend, Lake Ophelia National Wildlife Refuge and Hamburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
